title: Workshop on Methodologies for Developing Digital Educational Games

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of instructional design, understanding of game elements, experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented program for professionals to systematically acquire educational game development processes. Emphasizes interdisciplinary collaboration and application of the GAMED methodology

learning_goals: Design one game scenario aligned with educational objectives following the GAMED framework.
Collaboratively develop one prototype linking learning content with game mechanics.
Analyze game effectiveness through formative assessment and propose at least three improvement strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
